titleStmt.title: The declaration of the Estates of the kingdom of Scotland, containing the claim of right and the offer of the crown to Their Majesties, King William and Queen Mary: together with the grievances represented by the estates; and Their Majesties oath at their acceptance of the crown.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Convention of Estates.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, by order of Parliament,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: At Edinburgh, the 21 of June 1689.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
